title: NTPC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Associate Posts
description: The Northern Thermal Power Corporation Limited (NTPC) has officially released the notiifcation to fill the vacancies of 01 Associate Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree and B.E./B. Tech can apply for the NTPC Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, ap...
